nodes.label: message
nodes.text: I was wondering if Dr. Person1 could refill this RX for me for the pain we discussed at my video visit yesterday. It works a little better than the Oxycodone. I only have a few pills left, and wanted to try to have it before the weekend. Thanks,  Person2
